extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: MTHE 455 or STAT 455 or permission of the department. Must be registered in BSCE.

basic.description: This course covers performance models for data networking, delay models and loss models; analysis of multiple access systems, routing, and flow control; multiplexing; priority systems; satellite multiple access, wireless networking, wireless sensor networks. Knowledge of networking protocols is not required.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Data Networks
